name: Funny Plinko Land
description:
New free Plinko game for you to have fun. You just need to click the screen, drop the balls to receive different rewards. Very easy to control but brings you infinite delight and surprise!

—To tap the screen, then the small balls will drop down, the balls fall into the prize boxes below to get gold coin rewards. When the balls fall into the slots, you will have a jackpots chance.

—Please drop the balls constantly to get more coins and prizes, the more you play, the more rewards you will win!

—Balls are available free, if the balls run out, check back later and more balls will be available! 

Play this lucky Plinko game right now, every day will be your lucky day!
